overview: An abandoned factory is the haunt of prostitutes, pimps, thieves and derelicts. But on of these down and outs has an unusual past: as director of a "progressive" prison, he encourages his detainees to pursue complete sexual satisfaction to ease the trauma of their incarceration. He narrates his story in all its sizzling erotic detail. Nothing is left to the imagination as a national scandal erupts before our very eyes!
title: Off Limits
